entry.title: Useful Linux Commands for Hacking
entry.summary:
Common Linux Commands for Hacking.
Command Description Example
hostname Displays the hostname of the machine hostname
uname -a Displays Sys information, may help to find kernel vulneribilities uname -a
/proc/version Information about processess, helps to find kernel and compiler info ...

entry.title: Let’s Block Our Ads For Free and Also Keep Our Children safe

link.title: Let’s Block Our Ads For Free and Also Keep Our Children safe

entry.summary:
Let’s Block ads, those annoying little popups, with NextDNS. Before, we start that, let’s understand the concept of DNS.
DNS according to Cloudflare is a Phonebook of Internet. It translates your domain name to ip address. Each computer or device connected to internet has different IP address and its too much for us to remember those numbers. So instead of need to remembering addresses we hav...

entry.summary:

entry.title: Vulnhub Kioptrix Walkthrough Part 1
entry.summary:
Default username: John Default Password: TwoCows2
Tips: Save your all Scans in text/image for future use
Lets find our IP
Start Virtual Machine ip a in your main OS terminal, this will give us ip of our target machine Now go to your main machine Kali run sudo arp-scan -l
This will give us IP address, Mac Address and Vendor We are looking for our matching IP. or Azureware/VMware
